verses.name: Ezekiel 12:22
verses.text: Son of man, what is that proverb that ye have in the land of Israel, saying, The days are prolonged, and every vision faileth?

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:23
verses.text: Tell them therefore, Thus saith the Lord God; I will make this proverb to cease, and they shall no more use it as a proverb in Israel; but say unto them, The days are at hand, and the effect of every vision.

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:24
verses.text: For there shall be no more any vain vision nor flattering divination within the house of Israel.
